name: EZCO
overview:
EZ COURSES.ORG LLC (EZCO) was founded in 2012 and its’ principal mission is to develop high-technology products for military and commercial and applications.

EZCO develops and manufactures of high-technology products, primarily in radar and sensor technologies. The Company’s primary product, currently under design and development, is the 360° European Aviation Safety Agency (EASA) Radar with several variations for both the military and commercial applications.

The 360° EASA Radar is will provide superior, as compared to the competition, field-of-view (FOV), high resolution, on-board signal processing, and the industry’s fastest broadband data transmission throughput. Future plans include developing a range of product variations within one year. Additional with variations will be developed in response to market demands.

EZCO is a registered federal contractor and certified veteran owned business. Principal offices are located in Surprise, AZ as an Affiliate of the AZ TechCelerator Incubator, in association with the Maricopa Small Business Development Center.
